main event: A civilian in Limona, Florida observed a bright, moon-like object with a flaming ragged border, which appeared to drop and move slowly back and forth before disappearing below the horizon.
interesting points: The object was initially the size of a dinner plate and later appeared the size of a tea saucer.
The observation lasted for approximately 25 minutes.
The object was spotted at 20 degrees elevation and later rose to 30 degrees before dropping below the horizon.
The report references a sighting of an unidentified object at White Sands Proving Ground traveling at a speed of over 2400 mph at an altitude of [redacted].
The witness was a 60-year-old public health nurse who appeared to be of high integrity and average intelligence.
sighted object: bright, moon-like object with a flaming ragged border
